features.aboutP1: Founded in 2024, SuperGamb leads the blockchain casino industry. We provide an outstanding collection of original games and premium licensed slots, all powered by provable fair technology. We guard your funds like they're our own. Built on blockchain for ultimate security and trust.
features.aboutP2: Join SuperGamb today and be part of something great! Our platform operates fully on blockchain technology and smart contracts, ensuring complete transparency, unbiased gameplay, and maximum protection for every player.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about SuperGamb and our platform
faq.a1: Established in 2024, SuperGamb serves as a pioneering force in online blockchain gaming. We deliver an outstanding gaming experience featuring unique Original Games and premium Slots from licensed providers, available to players worldwide. Our secure, reliable, and fully decentralized platform allows seamless crypto and fiat betting with uncompromising security standards.
faq.q2: What makes betting at SuperGamb safe?
faq.a2: At SuperGamb, your safety and security come first. We built a trusted gaming environment with advanced responsible gambling tools that are easy to use. Your personal data is protected, your funds are secure, and every game is completely transparent. We believe modern gaming must be decentralized to ensure true fairness, which is why SuperGamb operates fully on blockchain technology and smart contracts.
faq.q3: What does it mean for SuperGamb to be a decentralized gaming platform?
faq.a3: The key advantage of decentralized platforms like SuperGamb is our blockchain architecture. We eliminated any central authority or intermediary at every level of casino operation. SuperGamb runs on smart contracts, self-executing agreements with transparent rules at the system core. These contracts automatically guarantee fairness, equal winning chances for everyone, instant deposits, and fast withdrawals with no delays.
faq.q4: How can I claim my welcome bonus?
faq.a4: Thank you for choosing SuperGamb! To claim your welcome bonus, simply follow these steps: (1) Register and create your account; (2) Go to the Bonuses section; (3) Enter your promo code; (4) Your bonus is ready — enjoy the game!
faq.q5: How do I sign up for a SuperGamb account?
faq.a5: Registration at SuperGamb is fast and simple. All you need is your email address. The entire process takes just 15 seconds or less. Once registered, you gain instant access to SuperGamb's secure, transparent, and fully decentralized licensed gaming platform featuring an exceptional variety of games and exclusive bonuses.
faq.q6: How can I reach customer support?
faq.a6: The fastest and easiest way to reach SuperGamb's support team is through Live Chat. This service works on any device and connects you instantly with our professional customer support available 24/7. Our team is always ready to help with any questions about SuperGamb, gameplay, account security, payments, and more.

deposit.title: Deposit Crypto
deposit.networkDesc: All deposits use BNB Smart Chain (BSC/BEP20) network. Make sure to send on the correct network to avoid loss of funds.
deposit.howTo3: Send {{crypto}} to this address on BNB Smart Chain network
deposit.howTo5: Your balance will be updated automatically
deposit.warningText: Only send {{crypto}} to this address on BNB Smart Chain (BSC/BEP20). Sending any other cryptocurrency or using a different network will result in permanent loss of funds.

withdraw.title: Withdraw Funds
withdraw.requirementText: To withdraw ${{amount}}, you must first deposit:
withdraw.requirementFee: This is a withdrawal fee for security verification purposes.
withdraw.saveAddressHint: Save an address to use for withdrawals.
withdraw.networkDesc: All transactions use BNB Smart Chain (BSC/BEP20) network.
withdraw.noAddressToCopy: No address saved to copy. Save an address first.
withdraw.validAmount: Please enter a valid withdrawal amount
withdraw.withdrawalSentTo: Your withdrawal will be sent to your saved {{crypto}} address.
withdraw.chooseFeeAddress: Choose which address to send the fee to
withdraw.sendFeeHint: Send ${{amount}} in {{crypto}} to the address above to complete your request.
withdraw.feeReminder: You still haven't sent the fee. Your withdrawal will only be processed after the fee is received.
withdraw.feeWarningToast: You still haven't sent the fee. Send ${{amount}} in {{crypto}} to the address above to complete your withdrawal. Until then your request is pending.
